hadiths.text: Jubair narrated from Abu Ad-Darda, or Abu Dharr, that :Allah's Messenger narrated that Allah, Blessed and Most High said: "Son of Adam: Perform four Rak'ah for Me in the beginning of the day it will suffice you for the latter part of it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي صَلاَةِ الضُّحَى
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Duha Prayer
